resources.string:
Freshers are usually shy … 
 The purpose of the first task is to put the freshman in the right frame of mind to face the challenges ahead! 
 Freshman, for goodness sake, head out to the patio in front of the bar of Building A! 

 Task: The freshman has to walk, for 5 minutes in a row, around the courtyard of the ed. A, blinking an eye and smiling with the front camera of the mobile device pointed at you

Campus 2 has several buildings, each one identified by a letter (A, B, C, D). Some have been studying for several years at IPL and have difficulty remembering the letter that identifies a particular building. Caloiro, for your convenience, go to the roundabout at the entrance to Ed. A! Task: The freshman has to take a picture of the letter that identifies each of the four buildings.

The José Saramago Library is perhaps the most emblematic of Campus 2 buildings. Any self-respecting e-Godfather should motivate his freshman to acclimatize to this temple of knowledge. Caloiro, Please, go to the Library! \n \nTest: The José Saramago Library is an area of ​​Culture, Knowledge and …?

Being familiar is a lot of fun, but in the end you have to go back to the real world … 
 The freshman should carry out an outdoor meditation session that allows him to relax so that you can go back to class calmly and concentratively. 
Colour, for your convenience, head out to the patio in front of the bar of Building A! 
 
Test: The freshman must be seated for 10 minutes, in the courtyard of the ed. A, with the phone on your lap with the screen facing down (it s for relaxing!). If it is raining the freshman can fulfill this task in one of the 3 points of interest nearest the place where it is.

Campus 2 has several buildings, each one identified by a letter (A, B, C, D). 
There are many years of studying (or working …) in the IPL and have difficulty remembering the letter that identifies a particular building. 
Calendar, please, go to the roundabout at the entrance to Ed. A! 
 
Test: The freshman has to go to all the buildings and confirm that he is near them when showing with the camera "Building X"
